Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Effect  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicEffect
    this is the basic effect class, with the standard method, this class will be decorated according to the chosen Card
    BlockOpponentEffect
    this decorator blocks the possibility of opponent player to move up during their turn
    BuildBeforeEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build before every move action, if the player uses this god's effect, he cannot move up in the same turn
    BuildInsideCellEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build twice, but player can not build for the second time on the perimeter cells
    BuildNotOnSameCellEffect  
    BuildOnSameCellEffect  
    BuildUnderItselfEffect  
    CanBuildUnderItselfEffect  
    CanDestroyEffect  
    CanForceEffect  
    CanPushOpponentEffect  
    CanSwitchOpponentEffect  
    DestroyEffect  
    DomeBuildEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build a dome even if the level isn't number 3
    DownTwoEffect  
    EffectDecorator
    this is the decorator of the effect, each type of decorator extends this class according with pattern decorator
    MoreBuildInsideEffect  
    MoreBuildNotOnSameEffect  
    MoreBuildOnSameEffect  
    MoreMoveEffect  
    MovePerimeterAgainEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to move again each time the pawn moves onto perimeter space
    NotMoveBackEffect  
    NotMoveUpEffect  
    PushEffect  
    SwitchEffect
